figure_1: Daily titrated basal insulin dose (LS means) for insulin-naive patients starting treatment with insulin glargine at a strength of 100 units per milliliter (Gla-100) or insulin glargine at a strength of 300 units per milliliter (Gla-300)
figure_2: Preswitch and postswitch daily basal insulin dose for patients switching to treatment with insulin glargine at a strength of 100 units per milliliter (Gla-100) or insulin glargine at a strength of 300 units per milliliter (Gla-300)
